html:
News Releases, Media Advisories

For Immediate Release
November 19, 2002		 Contact: Bob Biersack
Ron Harris
Ian Stirton
Kelly Huff
Advisory to Editors, Reporters, Broadcasters, Correspondents:

FEC Commissioners have voted to change the time of the November 21 open meeting from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.

Items to be discussed at the session include:

--Final Rules and Explanation and Justification on Disclaimers, Fraudulent Solicitations, Personal Use of Campaign Funds, and Civil Penalties

# # #
title: FEC Changes November 21, 2006 Open Meeting Start Time to 1:00 p.m.
